FAJNE PRZYPADKIEM:
fi = x(pi-|pi-x|), psi = x(2pi-x)


NA ODCINKU (0,2pi)

1. psi = 0
a) fi = x(2pi-x)
b) fi = pi-|pi-x|

a) fi = x(2pi-x)

```{r}
t<-0
T<-30
dt<-0.01
dx<-0.01
x<-linspace(0,2*pi,2*pi/dx)
u0<-x*(2*pi-x)
c=1
C=c*dt/dx
k<-length(u0)
u1<-u0
u1[2:(k-1)]<-u1[2:(k-1)]-(C^2)*(u0[1:(k-2)]+u0[3:k]-2*u0[2:(k-1)])/2
u<-rbind(u0,u1)
i<-2

while(t<T-dt){
  un<--u[i-1,]+2*u[i,]
  un[2:(k-1)]<-un[2:(k-1)]+(C^2)*(u[i,1:(k-2)]+u[i,3:k]-2*u[i,2:(k-1)])
  un[1]<-0
  un[length(un)]<-0
  u<-rbind(u,un)
  t<-t+dt
  i<-i+1
}

#for (i in 1:20){
#plot(u[i*100,],type='l',ylim=c(-10,10))}
```

1'. szeregiem
psi = 0
a) fi = x(2pi-x)
b) fi = pi-|pi-x|

$\int_0^{2\pi}x(2\pi-x)\sin(\frac{nx}{2})dx=-\frac{8}{n^3}(n\pi\sin(n\pi)+2\cos(n\pi)-2)$

$\int_0^{2\pi}(\pi-|\pi-x|)\sin(\frac{n\pi}{2})=\frac{4}{n^2}(2\sin(\frac{n\pi}{2})-\sin(n\pi))$

```{r}
f1<-function(n){
  return(-8*(n*pi*sin(n*pi)+2*cos(n*pi)-2)/(n^3))
}
f2<-function(n){
  4*(2*sin(n*pi/2)-sin(n*pi))/(n^2)
}
```

a)

```{r}
T<-20
dt<-0.01
dx<-0.01
x<-linspace(0,2*pi,2*pi/dx)
u<-rbind(c(),c())
for (l in 1:(T/dt)){
  t<-dt*l
  sum<-rep(0,length(x))
  for (n in 1:100){
    A<-f1(n)/pi
    B<-0
    step<-sin(n*x/2)*(A*cos(n*t/2)+B*sin(n*t/2))
    sum<-sum+step
  }
  u<-rbind(u,sum)
}

```


a) psi = x(2pi-x)

```{r}
t<-0
T<-20
dt<-0.01
dx<-0.01
x<-linspace(0,2*pi,2*pi/dx)
u0<-rep(0,length(x))
c=1
C=c*dt/dx
k<-length(u0)
u1<-u0+dt*x*(2*pi-x)
#u1<-u0
u1[2:(k-1)]<-u1[2:(k-1)]-(C^2)*(u0[1:(k-2)]+u0[3:k]-2*u0[2:(k-1)])/2
uc<-rbind(u0,u1)
i<-2

while(t<T-dt){
  #un[1]<-0
  #un[length(un)]<-un[length(un)-1]+dx
  un<--uc[i-1,]+2*u[i,]
  un[2:(k-1)]<-un[2:(k-1)]+(C^2)*(uc[i,1:(k-2)]+uc[i,3:k]-2*uc[i,2:(k-1)])
  un[1]<-0 #un[1]-dx
  un[length(un)]<-0 #un[length(un)-1]+dx
  uc<-rbind(uc,un)
  t<-t+dt
  i<-i+1
}
plot(u[1,],type='l',ylim=c(-20,20))

```

NA KWADRACIE

```{r}
dx<-0.04
u0<-matrix(0,50,50)
for (i in 25:0){
  v<-sin(linspace(0,2,2/dx)*pi)*(1-i/25)
  u0[25-i,]<-v
  u0[25+i,]<-v
}
plot_ly(z=u0,type='surface')

dt<-0.1
C<-1
T<-10
t<-0
i<-2
u <- array(0,dim=c(50,50,T/dt))
u[,,1]<-u0
u1<-u0
u1[2:(k-1),2:(k-1)]<-u1[2:(k-1),2:(k-1)]-(C^2)*(u0[1:(k-2),1:(k-2)]+u0[3:k,3:k]-2*u0[2:(k-1),2:(k-1)])/2
u[,,2]<-u1

while(t<T-3*dt){
  k<-50
  un<--u[,,i-1]+2*u[,,i]
  un[2:(k-1),2:(k-1)]<-un[2:(k-1),2:(k-1)]+(C^2)*(u[,,i][1:(k-2),1:(k-2)]+u[,,i][3:k,3:k]-2*u[,,i][2:(k-1),2:(k-1)])
  un[1,]<-0
  un[,1]<-0
  un[,k]<-0
  un[k,]<-0
  u[,,i+1]<-un
  t<-t+dt
  i<-i+1
}

plot_ly(z=u[,,1],type='surface')
plot_ly(z=u[,,2],type='surface')
plot_ly(z=u[,,3],type='surface')
plot_ly(z=u[,,4],type='surface')
plot_ly(z=u[,,5],type='surface')
plot_ly(z=u[,,6],type='surface')
plot_ly(z=u[,,7],type='surface')
plot_ly(z=u[,,8],type='surface')
plot_ly(z=u[,,9],type='surface')

Y<-as.data.frame.table(u)

p
```

```{r}

library(mnormt)
x     <- seq(-5, 5, 0.25) 
y     <- seq(-5, 5, 0.25)
mu    <- c(0, 0)
sigma <- matrix(c(1, 0, 0, 1), nrow = 2)
f     <- function(x, y) dmnorm(cbind(x, y), mu, sigma)
z     <- outer(x, y, f)

plot_ly(z=z,type='surface')

u0<-z
dt<-0.1
C<-1
T<-10
t<-0
i<-2
k<-41
u <- array(0,dim=c(k,k,T/dt))
u[,,1]<-u0
u1<-u0
u1[2:(k-1),2:(k-1)]<-u1[2:(k-1),2:(k-1)]-(C^2)*(u0[1:(k-2),1:(k-2)]+u0[3:k,3:k]-2*u0[2:(k-1),2:(k-1)])/2
u[,,2]<-u1

while(t<T-3*dt){
  un<--u[,,i-1]+2*u[,,i]
  un[2:(k-1),2:(k-1)]<-un[2:(k-1),2:(k-1)]+(C^2)*(u[,,i][1:(k-2),1:(k-2)]+u[,,i][3:k,3:k]-2*u[,,i][2:(k-1),2:(k-1)])
  un[1,]<-0
  un[,1]<-0
  un[,k]<-0
  un[k,]<-0
  u[,,i+1]<-un
  t<-t+dt
  i<-i+1
}

Y<-as.data.frame.table(u)
p<-plot_ly(Y, x =~Var1, y=~Var2, z = ~Freq, frame =~Var3, type = 'heatmap')
p
```
